short_summary: Automotive and light truck maintenance and repair for CFSD
description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below.  The delivery is requested at 25 CFSD and 7 CFSD by March 29th, 2024.
tags: Quebec » Medicine Hat » Transportation » Repair Facilities
full_summary:
## SMP – Trailers - Spares – Assembly Tender Notice

* **Bid Title:** SMP – Trailers - Spares – Assembly Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Reference Number:** W8486-249360/A
* **Modification Number:** 7
* **Publication Date:** November 17, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** January 22, 2024, 2:00 PM Eastern Standard Time (EST)

### Description
The Department of National Defence invites bids for the purchase of spares and assembly of SMP trailers. The delivery is requested for nineteen items across two Defence Acquisition and Depot Maintenance Facility locations: 25 CFSD Montreal, Quebec, and 7 CFSD Edmonton, Alberta.

### Tender Information
* **Tender Status:** Expired
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive – Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements:** Please refer to Tender Description or Tender Documents

### Bid Submission Information
Bidders must submit their proposal electronically to the following email address:

DLP53BidsReceiving.DAAT53Receptiondessoumissions@forces.gc.ca

### Tender Documents
The tender documents including specifications and Design Data List (DDL) can be found at the following links:
* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/25101/w8486-249360---smp---spares---assembly---rfp---english-amdt-001.pdf,https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/25101/w8486-249360---smp---spares---assembly---rfp---english---amdt-002.pdf,https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/25101/w8486-249360---smp---spares---assembly---rfp---english.pdf

### Bidder Requirements
In order to be eligible to bid on this contract, the bidder must have a valid Vendor Number as specified on the Vendor Registration and Information Network (VRIN) website.

### Contact Information
If you require any additional information or clarification on this tender, please do not hesitate to contact us. You can reach us by:

* Email: valerie.rivet@forces.gc.ca
* Phone: (000) 000-0000

### Bid Evaluation
Bidders must ensure that their proposal meets the requirements outlined in the tender documents. Proposals
